DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine effect prophylactic antifungal therapy fluconazole incidence severity radiation-associated mucositis/thrush patient head neck cancer undergo definitive radiotherapy . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo standard hyperfractionated radiotherapy 5 day week 5-5.6 week . Patients receive oral fluconazole day 1-4 28-31 radiotherapy . - Arm II : Patients undergo radiotherapy arm I . Patients develop microbiologically proven fungal infection clinically evident oral cavity and/or oropharyngeal thrush may receive fluconazole arm I . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : At least 42 patient ( 26 per arm ) accrue study .
